description: The url of the Qdrant instance.

actions.name: add_points_to_collection
actions.description: Insert a point (= embedding or vector + other infos) to a specific collection, if the collection does not exist it will be created

actions.name: delete_collection
actions.description: Delete a collection of your database

actions.name: delete_points
actions.description: Delete points of a specific collection

actions.name: collection_infos
actions.description: Get the all the infos of a specific collection

actions.name: collection_list
actions.description: Get the list of all the collections of your database

actions.name: get_points
actions.description: Get the points of a specific collection

actions.name: search_points
actions.description: Search for points closest to your given vector (= embedding)
